events.name: Jazz Concert in the Park
events.description: Enjoy a night full of jazz music in Central Park. There will be performances by local bands and a wide variety of jazz styles for all tastes. Don't miss it!

events.name: Artificial Intelligence Talk
events.description: An event to learn about the latest trends in artificial intelligence. Experts in the field will share their knowledge, and there will be live demonstrations of AI applications in various industries.

events.name: Vegan Cooking Workshop
events.description: Learn to prepare delicious vegan recipes in this hands-on workshop. Our chefs will teach you techniques and tricks to cook vegan dishes that will amaze your friends and family.
